channel.title: Latest alerts from Tanzania Meteorological Authority
channel.description: Latest alerts from Tanzania Meteorological Authority

image.title: Latest alerts from Tanzania Meteorological Authority

item.title: YELLOW ADVISORY: Strong wind and large waves
item.description: Strong wind and large waves are expected over coastal areas of Dar es salaam, Tanga, Pwani, Lindi and Mtwara regions together with Unguja and Pemba isles. Likelihood of occurrence is MEDIUM and expected Impacts are MODERATE. The expected impacts of this phenomenon are disruption to marine activities.
item.author: severe@meteo.go.tz (Tanzania Meteorological Authority)

item.title: YELLOW ADVISORY: Strong winds.
item.description: strong wind reaching 40km/hr is issued for the Lake Nyasa (Songwe, Njombe and Ruvuma regions). Likelihood of occurrence is MODERATE and expected Impacts are MODERATE. The expected impacts of this phenomenon are Some disruption to marine activities.
item.author: severe@meteo.go.tz (Tanzania Meteorological Authority)
